title: Nyungwe park Tour
description: Nyungwe National Park lies in southwest Rwanda, partly abutting the Burundi border. It's a vast area of mountain rainforest, home to many species of chimpanzees, plus owl-faced and colobus monkeys

title: Akagera park Tour
description: day Akagera Tour is one of the best short Rwanda safaris, taking you to explore and experience Akagera National Park. It is an exceptional Rwanda short game viewing tour trip crafted for you to indulge yourself into the magical African savannas of Akagera National Park. Your 1 day Akagera Tour takes you through a memorable big game trip-for you to see big mammal species including African bush elephants, buffaloes, lions, leopards and rhinos.

title: Kivu lake Tour
description: Lake Kivu is one of the African Great Lakes. It lies on the border between the Democratic Republic of the Congo and Rwanda, and is in the Albertine Rift, the western branch of the East African Rift.
